newsitem.title: USA: Chronimed names Blissenbach as president.
newsitem.headline: Chronimed names Blissenbach as president.

text.p: Chronimed Inc said its board elected Henry Blissenbach to the post of president and chief operating officer.

Blissenbach will be responsible for directing all of Chronimed's operating businesses and will report to Maurice Taylor II who gives up the title of president but remains chairman and chief executive officer.
Blissenbach, elected to the medical company's board in September 1995, remains a director. He is a founder of the Academy of Managed Care Pharmacy.
